definition: Qingbaijiang district of Chengdu city 成都市[Cheng2 du1 shi4], Sichuan
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
Qingbaijiang district of Chengdu city 成都市[Cheng2 du1 shi4], Sichuan

sentences.english: The strati-graphic characteristics of the system are discussed for each subarea.
sentences.chinese: 文中并分区叙述青白口系的地层特征。

sentences.english: The most common glaze was the bluish white Qingbai.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的是蓝白色釉面青白。

sentences.english: Tender, and no meat stimulation mud gamey smell.
sentences.chinese: 肉青白细嫩，且无泥腥气。

sentences.english: I breathe in its bluish white air.
sentences.chinese: 我呼进了它青白的气息。

definition: color (of one's skin, a sign of good health)/red of cheeks
(dialect) intensity of the fire (in cooking, kiln firing etc)
to be suffused with white/to be discolored/to blanch
to turn pale/to lose color/to go white
